sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_DETAIL ( class_detail_id, class_master_id, student_id, teacher_id, song, date, time, ranges, s_time, e_time, hw, teacher_note, student_note, type, finish, sign, status, updater, update_time ) VALUES ( #class_detail_id#, #class_master_id#, #student_id#, #teacher_id#, #song#, #date#, #time#, #ranges#, #s_time#, #e_time#, #hw#, #teacher_note#, #student_note#, #type#, #finish#, #sign#, #status#, #updater#, #update_time# )
sqlMap.select: SELECT class_detail_id,d.class_master_id, m.name as class_name, d.student_id,d.teacher_id, (SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=d.student_id) as student_name, (SELECT name FROM person WHERE person_id=d.teacher_id) as teacher_name, song,d.type,date, d.time, (SELECT interval_time FROM courses_time WHERE id=d.time) as interval_time, ranges,s_time,e_time,hw,teacher_note,student_note,finish,sign,d.status,d.updater FROM CLASS_DETAIL d ,CLASS_MASTER m WHERE d.class_master_id = m.class_master_id d.class_detail_id = #class_detail_id# d.class_master_id = #class_master_id# d.student_id = #student_id# d.teacher_id = #teacher_id# d.song = #song# d.date = #date# d.time = #time# d.ranges = #ranges# d.s_time = #s_time# d.e_time = #e_time# d.hw = #hw# d.teacher_note = #teacher_note# d.student_note = #student_note# d.type = #type# d.finish = #finish# d.sign = #sign# d.status = #status# d.updater = #updater# d.update_time = #update_time# d.date >= #today# d.time > #now_time# ( d.date like #date_pre# or d.date like #date_now# or d.date like #date_next# ) d.date between #date_between_start# and #date_between_end# ORDER BY $order$ $fromIndex$, $rowLimit$ $rowLimit$
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CLASS_DETAIL class_detail_id = #class_detail_id# class_master_id = #class_master_id# student_id = #student_id# teacher_id = #teacher_id# song = #song# date = #date# time = #time# ranges = #ranges# s_time = #s_time# e_time = #e_time# hw = #hw# teacher_note = #teacher_note# student_note = #student_note# type = #type# finish = #finish# sign = #sign# status = #status# updater = #updater# update_time = #update_time# WHERE class_detail_id = #class_detail_id#
UPDATE CLASS_DETAIL sign = #sign# WHERE date = #date# AND time = #time#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO CLASS_DETAIL ( class_master_id, student_id, teacher_id, type, date, time, ranges ) VALUES ( #class_master_id#, #student_id#, #teacher_id#, #type#, #date#, #time#, #ranges# ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE date = #date#, time = #time#
